title: Virtual Reality-Based Classroom Management Skills Training for Secondary Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational psychology and classroom management theories
context.additional_context: Training program to experience real classroom environments and receive feedback through interactions with 3D virtual students

learning_goals: Learners will apply response strategies for 30 students' diverse disruptive behaviors in virtual classroom environments with 80% accuracy.
Learners will execute three or more effective classroom management techniques (e.g., attention-grabbing, positive reinforcement) appropriately in VR simulations.
Learners will improve their classroom management approaches in three or more ways based on behavior analysis reports provided after simulations.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
